Value: Traffic Volumes (a.k.a.Traffic Counts) are surveyed from the California State Highway System. The data originated from Caltrans Traffic Census database compiled by Caltrans Districts Offices. The Districts calculated the volumes hourly, daily, and monthly to derive an annual average daily traffic count. Volumes are surveyed in both directions, "Back" describes south or west of the location at which the count was recorded and "Ahead" describes north or east of the location at which the count was recorded. More info: https://dot.ca.gov/programs/traffic-operations/census
AADT,Annual Average Daily Traffic,Traffic Counts,Traffic Volumes
Division of Traffic Operations, Office of System Performance, Traffic Data Branch
Caltrans District, County, Route, Peak Hour, Peak Month, Daily Annual Average
